alert.note: Alert for Butte; Glenn (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 5:35PM PDT until March 23 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Butte County in northern California... Southeastern Glenn County in central California... * Until 630 PM PDT. * At 534 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bluegum, or near Willows, moving east at 5 mph. Nickel size hail has been reported with this storm near Willows. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Willows, Glenn, Artois, Bluegum, Butte City, Codora and Ordbend. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
